'''Automatically Generated Legislative Actions'''


'''[[2017-2018 AB618 (USA CA)|AB 618]] Local Agency Public Construction Act: job order contracting: community college districts.'''
:*Catharine voted nay (against Do pass and be re-referred to the Committee on [Appropriations]).

'''[[2015-2016 SB32 (USA CA)|SB 32]] California Global Warming Solutions Act of 2006: emissions limit.'''

Final legislative action 2016-08-24 passed yeas 25, nays 13. 
:*Catharine voted nay (against SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading Amend By WILLIAMS Set #1).
:*Catharine voted nay (against SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading By RIDLEY-THOMAS).
:*Catharine voted nay (against SB 32 Pavley Motion to Reconsider).
:*Catharine voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading By GARCIA, E.).

'''[[2015-2016 SB350 (USA CA)|SB 350]] Clean Energy and Pollution Reduction Act of 2015.'''

Final legislative action 2015-09-11 passed yeas 26, nays 14. 
:*Catharine voted nay (against SB 350 De León Senate Third Reading Amend By WILLIAMS Set #1).
:*Catharine voted yea (in favor of SB 350 De León Senate Third Reading By ATKINS).

'''[[2015-2016 AB197 (USA CA)|AB 197]] State Air Resources Board: greenhouse gases: regulations.'''

Final legislative action 2016-08-24 passed yeas 45, nays 30. 
:*Catharine voted yea (in favor of AB 197 GARCIA, E. Assembly Third Reading).

'''[[2015-2016 AB1550 (USA CA)|AB 1550]] Greenhouse gases: investment plan: disadvantaged communities.'''

Final legislative action 2016-08-31 passed yeas 53, nays 22. 
:*Catharine voted nay (against AB 1550 GOMEZ Assembly Third Reading).
:*Catharine voted nay (against AB 1550 GOMEZ Concurrence in Senate Amendments).

'''[[2015-2016 AB1110 (USA CA)|AB 1110]] Greenhouse gases emissions intensity reporting: retail electricity suppliers.'''

Final legislative action 2016-08-31 passed yeas 54, nays 25. 
:*Catharine voted yea (in favor of AB 1110 TING Consent Calendar Second Day ).
:*Catharine voted nay (against AB 1110 TING Concurrence in Senate Amendments).

'''[[2015-2016 AB2722 (USA CA)|AB 2722]] Transformative Climate Communities Program.'''

Final legislative action 2016-08-31 passed yeas 49, nays 27. 
:*Catharine voted nay (against AB 2722 BURKE Assembly Third Reading).
:*Catharine voted nay (against AB 2722 BURKE Concurrence in Senate Amendments).
